name: Reddit - bigger thumbnails previews
description: Enlarges the default thumbnail previews on Reddit

user.name: Sam Nordberg
user.about: Just upping some styles that I personally made for my convenience. They're not perfect, but I think satisfactory.

additional_info:
Only applies when set to "Classic" type view, not "Card" or "Compact".

Includes a few other tweaks:
 - Removes the footer banner requesting you add a verified e-mail address to your account
 - Higher visibility selected post border
 - Enlarged voting button
 - Enlarged enlarging button
 - Remove Reddit footer
